pci_projects_project_regions_description: OVH offers several solutions for creating infrastructures, or  containers. By default, you have access to a selection of regions but you can choose to add new regions.
pci_projects_project_regions_info_messag: Adding new regions may take up to a few minutes. Once the regions have been added, you can add servers or containers to them.
pci_projects_project_regions_add_region_: An error has occurred adding the zone: {{message}}
